## SetConfigHooks."get-config"() method

A `first` type hook. Its non null return value will be used as config after normalized.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
'get-config'(): UserConfig | void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[UserConfig](./packer.userconfig.md) \| void
